trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control is being moved within its own zone, or to another zone.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>evento viene generato quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>o altro controllo server è stato spostato all'interno della relativa area o in un'altra area.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>

trans-unit.source: This can occur both when a user drags a control, and when there is a programmatic move.
trans-unit.target: Ciò può verificarsi quando un utente trascina un controllo e quando si verifica uno spostamento a livello di codice.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A> method, and it provides an opportunity to cancel the moving process before it is complete or to track the user action.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>evento viene generato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A>(metodo) e offre l'opportunità per annullare il processo di spostamento prima del completamento o per tenere traccia dell'azione utente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>

trans-unit.source: If the move is completed and the control placed in a new position, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event.
trans-unit.target: Se lo spostamento viene completato e il controllo viene inserito in una nuova posizione, questo evento è seguito dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartMovingEventArgs class contains information about the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartMovingEventArgs contiene informazioni sul <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>

trans-unit.source: It provides access to the Web Parts control that is being moved and the zone it is being moved to.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce accesso a di controlli Web part che sono stato spostato e il fuso orario in che è stato spostato.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control being moved.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o un altro controllo server viene spostato.

trans-unit.source: The target <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> to which `webPart` is being moved.
trans-unit.target: La destinazione <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> a cui `webPart` è stato spostato.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the index of `webPart` relative to other controls within `zone`.
trans-unit.target: Un numero intero che indica l'indice di `webPart` relazione ad altri controlli all'interno di `zone`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Web Parts zone to which the Web Parts control is being moved.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la zona Web part in cui il controllo di Web part viene spostato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> to which the Web Parts control is being moved.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> in cui viene spostato di controlli Web part.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index position of a Web Parts control within its zone.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la posizione di indice di un controllo Web part all'interno dell'area.

trans-unit.source: The ZoneIndex property indicates the numerical order (or ordinal position) within the zone for the Web Parts control being moved in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà ZoneIndex indica l'ordine numerico (o la posizione ordinale) all'interno della zona per il controllo di Web part viene spostato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses this property to track and manage its collection of Web Parts controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo utilizza questa proprietà per tenere traccia e gestire l'insieme di controlli Web part in una pagina Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The value of the ZoneIndex property for a control might not equal the index value for the same control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Il valore della proprietà ZoneIndex per un controllo non può essere uguale il valore di indice del controllo stesso all'interno di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: The numerical order of a control within its zone.
trans-unit.target: L'ordine numerico di un controllo all'interno della zona.

trans-unit.source: The first control in a zone has an index value of zero.
trans-unit.target: Il primo controllo in una zona ha un valore di indice pari a zero.
